short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record, transcribe for Google Meet - Mobbana

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free Google Meet Extension.

Enhance your Google Meet experience with Mobbana. Designed to streamline your meetings and provide powerful customization options, this extension offers a suite of features to elevate your productivity and control during virtual gatherings.

Key Features:
✅ Meeting Timer: Stay on track and manage your time effectively with a built-in meeting timer.
✅ Do Not Disturb (DND) Mode : Minimize distractions during meetings by activating DND mode, which temporarily silences notifications and alerts.
✅ Picture-in-Picture (PIP) Mode: Multitask effortlessly while keeping an eye on your meeting with PIP mode, allowing you to navigate other tabs while still participating in the conversation.
✅ Full Screen Mode: Immerse yourself fully in your meetings by utilizing the full screen mode, optimizing your viewing experience.
✅ Custom Background Color: Personalize your meeting environment by selecting a custom background color that suits your style and preferences.
✅ Screenshot Full Screen: Capture important moments during your meetings with ease by taking full-screen screenshots directly from the extension.
✅ Auto Join Meeting : Auto join meetings with video closed, saving your time and efforts.
✅ Auto Admit / Deny Participants : Streamline the meeting process by automatically admitting or denying participants’ joining request, ensuring smooth and efficient entry for all attendees.
✅ Remove All Members : Clear the meeting space efficiently by removing all members with a single click, facilitating a fresh start for new discussions.
✅ Mute All Members: Maintain control over the meeting environment by muting all participants, ensuring focused discussions and minimizing distractions.

Coming Soon – The Big Features :
⭐ Record: Record your meetings for future reference and review.
⭐ Transcript: Generate transcripts of your meetings for easy reference and accessibility.

By downloading the extension, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
